column2: Number of Total Incidents Occurring By Bias Motivation Type

column14: Bias Motivation Subcategories Reports from 2014 and earlier do not provide verified incidents, only reported ones
Anti-Transgender and Non-conforming incidents was not recorded as part of the data until 2018

column3: Number of Verified Incidents Occuring by Bias Motivation Type

column16: This line chart shows the total number of verified incidents by bias motivation type from 2013 to 2023. Using this chart, the specific type of incidents could be seen and can be quanitified. It is seen that male anti-gay hate bias has peaked. In addition, the graph can be used to see the average number of incidents.
